name: Talk_Anna
_source: speak;Anna;...Can you hear me, Dev?|Hello?|Is your communication stone working?|Dev, I can hear you now.|...This is Anna 8L, ready to give my status report.|I'm here in Magvel L and things are...Interesting...|How are things going on your end?|.....You're monitering adjustments?|Huh, I see.|No wonder things are very...different here.|.....Tell me about it...|Yeah, I got in contact with this world's Eirika.|Got her the Master Seal.|.....Uh huh, I'll keep my eye out.|I don't know why, but <red>something feels off</>.|.....Sure, this Magvel has a lot of power flowing through.|But it feels...<red>Unnatural...</>

speak;Anna;.....I'm not crazy!|You're the one who sent me to this weird Magvel!|I almost spilled some top secrets!|I could've changed <red>history</> thanks to your little prank!|Well, whatever.|I'll let you know if I notice anything dangerous.|....Alright, I understand.|Bye.
speak;Eirika;What was that red headed merchant doing here?
